Basically PTSD is usually from a singular event, whereas CPTSD is usually from more than one event and typically started with some kind of developmental trauma (child neglect, for example). I know thatâ€™s very broad, but thatâ€™s how it was explained to me. CPTSD is usually a lot harder to treat simply because it is more deep-rooted and typically has more than one thing to re-process.
